timeline.bodyText: add a null check for columnNames? getColumnNames returns null too.
timeline.author: adesh-rao

timeline.bodyText:
Won't adding a qtest be better?
You are explicitly doing tblUpdated.getSd().getBucketCols() and updating them in the test. qtest will check end to end flow and you don't need to bother about getting Sd and updating the cols explicitly (Just a single alter table will do the trick).
timeline.author: adesh-rao

replies.bodyText: Method is added in standalone metastore. So we need to add some unit test case in some form to validate the code the while building the standalone.
replies.author: ashish-kumar-sharma

timeline.bodyText: Also, Is it a positive test case or negative? I see that there is an expected error but we are doing the positive validations too. We should break this into two, right?
timeline.author: adesh-rao

replies.bodyText: Divided the test in negative and positive
replies.author: ashish-kumar-sharma

replies.bodyText: As per HIVE column contract it should be case in-sensitive. But it is not handled properly in  query planning of "alter table {tablename} change". So I have added toLowerCase() in query planning also.
